#summary How to create and use SQLite database in Android.
#labels android,SQLite

== Archiving ==

Compress SQLite database file by [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/7Zip 7Zip] or WinZip using parameters: 
{{{ 
Compression method: classic ZIP method
Dictionary: 8 MB
}}}

{{{
Source: ruwikt20110521_android.sqlite
Result: ruwikt20110521_android_sqlite.zip
}}}

You can download `ruwikt20XXXXXX_android_sqlite.zip` file (see section "Downloads"). It contains machine-readable wiktionary + 1 small table for Android applications (see [File_mean_semrel_empty_sql], section "Preparing the SQLite database for Android").
